description: A description of edge packaging jobs.

parameters.name: EdgePackagingJobName
parameters.description: The name of the edge packaging job.

nested_items.name: EdgePackagingJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the edge packaging job.

nested_items.name: EdgePackagingJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the edge packaging job.

nested_items.name: CompilationJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the SageMaker Neo compilation job that is used to locate model artifacts that are being packaged.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the model.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that enables Amazon SageMaker to download and upload the model, and to contact Neo.

nested_items.name: OutputConfig
nested_items.description: The output configuration for the edge packaging job.

nested_items.name: S3OutputLocation
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) bucker URI.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (Amazon Web Services KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume after compilation job. If you don't provide a KMS key ID, Amazon SageMaker uses the default KMS key for Amazon S3 for your role's account.

nested_items.name: PresetDeploymentType
nested_items.description: The deployment type SageMaker Edge Manager will create. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services IoT Greengrass Version 2 components.

nested_items.name: PresetDeploymentConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration used to create deployment artifacts. Specify configuration options with a JSON string. The available configuration options for each type are:
Name of the GreenGrass V2 component. If not specified, the default name generated consists of 'SagemakerEdgeManager' and the name of your SageMaker Edge Manager packaging job.
Description of the component.
The version of the component.

nested_items.name: ResourceKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key to use when encrypting the EBS volume the job run on.

nested_items.name: EdgePackagingJobStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the packaging job.

nested_items.name: EdgePackagingJobStatusMessage
nested_items.description: Returns a message describing the job status and error messages.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the packaging job was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the job was last updated.

nested_items.name: ModelArtifact
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage (S3) URI where model artifacts ares stored.

nested_items.name: ModelSignature
nested_items.description: The signature document of files in the model artifact.

nested_items.name: PresetDeploymentOutput
nested_items.description: The output of a SageMaker Edge Manager deployable resource.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The deployment type created by SageMaker Edge Manager. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services IoT Greengrass Version 2 components.

nested_items.name: Artifact
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the generated deployable resource.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployable resource.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Returns a message describing the status of the deployed resource.
